name: ELEKTRA Cosmetics Glitter in Elektra #11 (holographic silver)
description: Steal the spotlight with this gorgeous holographic silver glitter! ELEKTRA is a staple among dancers, cheerleaders and performers thanks to its eye-catching multidimensional colour that can be seen from across the room. Great for body art and mehndi. Mix ELEKTRA with clear polish for sparkly nails. Or ask your nail tech to mix this glitter in your gel or shellac nails. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics glitter in Starlit #8 (holographic gold)
description: Our pictures of Starlit just doesn't do any justice. This eyecatching glitter is a beautiful shade of gold with holographic rainbow undertones. Cheerleaders love using Starlit all over their eyelids while on stage. Less daring beauties, use this holographic gold as a gorgeous eyeliner or mixed with body moisturizer. Sprinkle a few pinches of shimmer in your mane for a subtle golden halo. Our holographic glitters give a 3D effect to shellac nails. Elektra Cosmetics is the only company in North America that carries holographic glitters that are safe for eyes. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Eden #13 (holographic blue)
description: This holographic blue is simply gorgeous. We are at a loss of words on how to describe it. a A favourite among cheerleaders with blue uniforms and performers. All our holographic glitters give a 3D effect. Elektra Cosmetics is the only company in North America to have holographic glitters that are safe for the face! Eden can be added to gel or shellac nails to add a 3D effect. 10 grams.

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Too Face #14 (holographic pink)
description: Not for the faint of heart! This holographic purple-pink shimmer is a favourite among performers and cosmetic junkies thanks to its uniqueness. There is nothing like it out there! One swipe of Too Face is all you need to catch that certain someone’s eye. Great for body art and nail art. Hello gel and shellac nails! A favourite among cheerleaders with pink uniforms. Note: This glitter appears more pink on then purple. Photo doesn't do justice. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Misfit #4 (dark slate blue)
description: There’s a reason why celebs can’t get enough of this flattering slate blue/grey shimmer. We use Misfit on tons of photo shoots and red carpet events for a reason. We think it is because it works with every eye colour and skin tone. Say goodbye to boring black eyeliner and try this sexy alternative. Perfect for day or night, Misfit will be your new staple. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Angel #12 (soft champagne)
description: This bestselling champagne coloured glitter (also known as Exposed) adds a subtle radiance to your face. A soft line close to the lashes brings out specks of light in every eye colour. Mix a dab of Angel into your moisturize for a heavenly glow on your décolletage and legs. Spritz on hairspray and sprinkle Angel in your hair for an instant halo. Great for all ages and skin tones. Time to glow! Our top seller! 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Happily Ever After #7 (iridescent)
description: This iridescent white glitter should be a staple in every makeup kit because of its versatility. Happily Ever After looks best worn in the inner corners of the eyes, and not as an eyeliner. A little dab in the inner eye corners evokes a wide-eyed innocence and brightens the face. Brides can’t get enough of this stunning white iridescent glitter on their big day. Sheer enough to wear on the hair, body and face, Happily Ever After gives you that ‘je ne said quoi’ when you need it the most. Mix a dab into your moisturize for a heavenly glow on your décolletage and legs. Spray on hairspray and sprinkle a pinch in your hair for an instant halo. Great for all ages, including kids! 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Envy #6 (soft moss green)
description: Be the Envy of all your friends with this flattering moss green shimmer. Blue and brown eyes pop with this bestseller. For added drama play up those gorgeous eyes with tons of mascara. Get ready to bat those babies. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Elizabeth #3 (lilac)
description: Want to achieve enchanting eyes that have that “je ne sais quoi?” Look no further. We found the secret to irresistible peepers that will get people’s tongues wagging. Introducing Elizabeth , a gorgeous lilac shimmer that looks magnificent on all eye colours! One swipe of Elizabeth is all you need. A favourite among brunette beauties. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Starter Wife #2 (soft rose/pink)
description: This wearable soft rosy-pink shimmer enhances all eye colours and looks particularly charming on brown eyes. Mix a dash of Starter Wife with clear nail polish for sweet nails. Pat some on your lips for a sugary pout. The secret to wearing pink shimmer is to use a light hand. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Bittersweet #10 (gunmetal)
description: Make eyes glisten with this sultry bronzey/gunmetal shimmer. One subtle swipe of Bittersweet takes eyes from boring to babelicious! We call this colour "Sex in a Pot." It is the sexiest colour we have and the most wearable. A top seller among adults who are swipe it across their black eyeliner for added depth. Dark complexions look radiant when you mix this glitter with a moisturizer and apply it to the body. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Dreamer #5 (turquoise)
description: Enhance those baby blues and brown eyes with Dreamer . This turquoise shimmer looks charming paired with blue jeans and a tank on those casual days. To make eyes pop be sure to add a few coats of mascara. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Bollywood Beauty #9 (Red)
description: This bright red is coveted by burlesque beauties, performers and mehndi artists thanks to its gorgeousness. Dab Bollywood Beauty on your pout for serious bling. Mix a drop into your polish for sparkly tips. Or use it on your eyes to achieve some serious stares. The ultimate red for cheerleaders and burlesque beauties. 10 grams

name: Elektra Cosmetics Glitter in Galaxy #1 (pure silver)
description: Not for the faint of heart! This intense silver shimmer looks gorgeous when applied with a light hand. A staple among cheerleaders and dancers for good reason. Blink your eyes baby and all the attention will be on you. Use Galaxy for eyecatching body art and menhdi. 10 grams

name: The Naughty but Nice Holiday Kit (Limited Edition)
description:
Doesn't matter if you've been naughty or nice this year...this limited edition holiday kit has everything you need to play both roles.

This kit includes:
-One bottle of The Transformer Liquid Sealer & an applicator brush
-12 glitters in a variety of naughty and nice colours

The Naughty Ones:
Starlit (holographic gold)
Bollywood Beauty (red)
Eden (holographic blue)
Sexpot (aka Cosmo) (gunmetal)
Misfit (dark slate blue)
Elektra (holographic gold)

The Nice Ones:
Starter Wife (soft rose)
Elizabeth (lilac)
Envy (soft moss green)
Galaxy (pure silver)
Angel (aka Exposed) (soft champagne)
Happily Ever After (soft iridescent white)

For another $10 more, receive an additional Transformer Sealer and applicator brush

$135 value
Yours for $70

options.name: Naught but Nice Holiday Kit EXTRA Transformer

name: Let's Get the Party Started Kit (Limited Edition)
description:
This gorgeous and colourful kit has everything you need to get the party started for NYE and all those holiday parties! We have very limited supply of this kit so get yours before it is too late.


This kit includes:

-Glitter in Eden (holographic blue)
-Glitter in Too Face (holographic pink)
-A bottle of The Transformer Liquid Sealer & an applicator brush
-One package of hair crystals in Marilyn (soft champagne)
-One package of hair crystals in Bettie (blue)

Valued at $100. Yours for $45

name: The Goddess Kit (Limited Edition)
description:
Bring out the inner Goddess for NYE with this kit filled with everything you need to make your tresses sparkle and stand out. Perfect for getting ready with your gfs for a night on the town!

This limited edition kit includes:
-5 packages of iron-on hair crystals in Marilyn (champagne), Audrey (light pink), Bettie (Blue), Brigitte (Clear), and Siren (smokey grey, not shown)

Each package has 18 genuine Czech crystals!

Yours for $20
Valued at $100!

name: The Transfomer (Liquid Sealer) by Elektra Cosmetics
description: The Transformer is a water-based adhesive that bonds ALL glitters, mineral makeup and loose powders to the eyelids. One drop of this revolutionary formula makes all glitters and loose powders stay on for 10 hours! No more reapplying. No more mess. Safe for sensitive eyes. Use The Transformer to create stay-on-all-day eyeliner or to turn your loose eyeshadows into a stay-put eyeshadow. Tired of your brows melting off? Scrap a bit of your brow powder from the pan to make it loose then mix it with The Transformer. This ½ oz bottle is good for 150 applications. Comes with a mini application brush. What makes The Transformer unique? *Makes powders and glitter stay on for 10 hours. *Comes in a squeeze bottle that prevents spills and wastage. *Great for travel and is airport-friendly. *Non-sticky and non-irritating. *You control how much glitter is applied along with the thickness.

name: Elektra Iron-On Hair Crystals in Marilyn (Champagne, 18 crystals)
description: Introducing Elektra Iron-on Hair Crystals. Our genuine Czech crystals add instant glamour to hair and adhere to your tresses with a flatiron. They last 2-4 washes and are easy to apply! Our hair crystals can be styled and straightened without falling out. Each Crystal is made from multifaceted genuine Czech crystals. We don't carry imitation rhinestones! A favourite for proms, weddings and performers. Marilyn is a gorgeous champagne crystal that flatters all hair colours, especially blondes. A bestseller! Check out our video or see instructions below. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jhOFEJjJHDY Step 1: Cut clear application sheet with desired amount of crystals attached. Remove white backing and stick clear application paper on top of a small section of clean hair. Make sure crystals face up. Step 2: Flat iron hair for 4 seconds. Step 3: Once hair cools slowly remove the application paper. To remove, rub the crystal with hairspray or rubbing alcohol.

name: Elektra Iron-On Hair Crystals in Audrey (Light pink, 18 crystals)
description: Introducing Elektra Iron-on Hair Crystals. Our genuine Czech crystals add instant glamour to hair and adhere to your tresses with a flatiron. They last several washes and are easy to apply! Our hair crystals can be styled and straightened without falling out. Each Crystal is made from multifaceted genuine Czech crystals. We don't carry imitation rhinestones! A favourite for proms, weddings and performers. Audrey is our oh-so-glamour light pink crystals that suits all hair colours. These crystals looks particularly sweet in young children's hair. Check out our video or see instructions below. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jhOFEJjJHDY Step 1: Cut clear application sheet with desired amount of crystals attached. Remove white backing and stick clear application paper on top of a small section of clean hair. Make sure crystals face up. Step 2: Flat iron hair for 4 seconds. Step 3: Once hair cools slowly remove the application paper. To remove, rub the crystal with hairspray or rubbing alcohol.
